Class FriendHandler

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.FriendHandler
public final class FriendHandler extends NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
The friend handler used by BlockNBTHandler to handle each of the NBTCompound used in the "friends" sub-tag of each block. A single FriendHandler itself only handles a *single friend* in the list of friends.
Since:
0.3.0

    • getName

      @NotNull public @NotNull String getName()
      Get the name of the nbt container.
      Overrides:
      getName in class NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
      Returns:
      The name, or empty if none exists.
      Since:
      0.3.0

    • doesRepresentPublic

      public boolean doesRepresentPublic()
      A single friend handler can represent the whole player-base, giving access to anyone on the server with specific access flags. We represent everyone by using an invalid UUID.

    • getAccessFlags

      @NotNull public @NotNull EnumSet<BlockAccessFlag> getAccessFlags()
      Read the access flags of this block.
      Returns:
      A EnumSet of all flags for this block.
      Since:
      0.3.0

    • setAccessFlags

      public void setAccessFlags(@NotNull @NotNull EnumSet<BlockAccessFlag> flags)
      Sets the access flags for this block. ORs all flags together to one integer, then writes all of them to ACCESS_FLAGS_ATTRIBUTE.
      Parameters:
      flags - The new flags to use. These get converted to integers.
      Since:
      0.3.0

    • canRead

      public boolean canRead()
      Checks if this player can read the contents of the parents block.
      Returns:
      True, if the player is allowed to see the container's contents.
      Since:
      0.3.0

    • canWrite

      public boolean canWrite()
      Checks if this player can write the contents of the parents block. This means that the player should be allowed to take and add items at their will.
      Returns:
      True, if the player has write access to this block.
      Since:
      0.3.0

    • isManager

      public boolean isManager()
      A manager is allowed to edit redstone settings and remove/add and edit friends of a block they have this permission on.
      Returns:
      True, if the player is such a manager.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • mergeHandler

      public void mergeHandler(@NotNull @NotNull NBTHandler<?> handler)
      Copies all values of the other handler to this handler.

      This only merges values if handler is an instance of FriendHandler, and only merges the access flags.

      Overrides:
      mergeHandler in class NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
      Parameters:
      handler - The handler to copy values from.
      Since:
      0.4.7
